0.user_question: Indras has 8059170 letters in her name. Her sister's name has 4 more letters than half of the letters in Indras' name. How many letters are in Indras and her sister's names?

ost_step.1: First find out what half of Indras' letter count is which would be (8059170/2) = 4029585.
ost_step.2: Subtract four from this value because that represents the number of fewer letters compared to the whole amount; so you get (4029585 - 4). Which equals (4029581.) This figure signifies the quantity or length of his sister's full last name. Therefore, if we combine both their last name lengths together it becomes ((4029581) +(8059170)) . Hence, Total Letters= 12088751 Is the sum.
ost_step.3: Thus, adding up all these values results into 12088751 as our ultimate resultant numerical solution.. In conclusion, combining the two individual counts yields us the overall combined totality. As such for clarity sake...the response can now finally come forth saying 'In summary my primary outcome when considering only numerals stands at 12088751.' And thus concluding with..."The Answer lies herein."
ost_step.4: Final Conclusive Statement -> The answer is: 12088751.
